nodes.excerpt: Spaceman is an application for macOS that allows you to view your Spaces in the menu bar. Spaceman allows you to see which space you are currently on relative to the other spaces you have. Naming these spaces is also an option.
nodes.title: Spaceman - A macOS app to view virtual desktops in the menu bar
nodes.author: Jay

localize.description: Spaceman是一款适用于macOS的应用程序，它允许你在菜单栏中查看你的空间。Spaceman可以让你看到你当前所处的空间与你拥有的其他空间的相对关系。命名这些空间也是一个选项。
localize.tagline: 一个macOS应用程序，在菜单栏中查看虚拟桌面。

localize.description: Spaceman是一款適用於macOS的應用程序，它允許你在菜單欄中查看你的空間。Spaceman可以讓你看到你當前所處的空間與你擁有的其他空間的相對關係。命名這些空間也是一個選項。
localize.tagline: 一個macOS應用程序，在菜單欄中查看虛擬桌面。

nodes.excerpt: Bambuser’s Live Video Shopping technology drives customer engagement and sales for some of the world’s largest brands and retailers. Bambuser is now the platform of choice for companies seeking deeper connection with customers across digital platforms.
nodes.title: Bambuser - Live video shopping
nodes.author: Jimmy Hagelfors

localize.description: Bambuser的实时视频购物技术为一些世界上最大的品牌和零售商推动了客户参与和销售。Bambuser现已成为企业在数字平台上寻求与客户更深层次联系的首选平台。
localize.tagline: 现场视频购物

localize.description: Bambuser的實時視頻購物技術爲一些世界上最大的品牌和零售商推動了客戶參與和銷售。Bambuser現已成爲企業在數字平臺上尋求與客戶更深層次聯繫的首選平臺。
localize.tagline: 現場視頻購物

nodes.excerpt: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.
nodes.title: Distributed - Stay in sync with friends, family and colleagues
nodes.author: Asim Aslam

localize.description: Distributed是一款新的实时社交聊天应用，帮助远程团队保持同步。它一开始只是一个果酱演示，但在每天花2-3个小时在上面之后，我们意识到它填补了我们工作生活中的一个巨大漏洞，因为我们都去了远程。
localize.tagline: 与朋友、家人和同事保持同步。

localize.description: Distributed是一款新的實時社交聊天應用，幫助遠程團隊保持同步。它一開始只是一個果醬演示，但在每天花2-3個小時在上面之後，我們意識到它填補了我們工作生活中的一個巨大漏洞，因爲我們都去了遠程。
localize.tagline: 與朋友、家人和同事保持同步。

nodes.excerpt: A pack of 55 High-quality Illustrations & Animations. Simply drag and drop these illustrations & animations to supercharge your project in seconds! We've created illustrations for e-commerce, marketing, SaaS and Education. I've included an exclusive 50% OFF.

nodes.excerpt: Sleepedy provides personalized sleep therapy by connecting you with a sleep coach and automatically tracking your sleep with wearables like the Apple Watch and Oura Ring. If you don't have one, we'll lend you an Apple Watch.
nodes.title: Sleepedy - Track and improve sleep with a personal sleep coach
nodes.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: Sleepedy通过将你与睡眠教练联系起来，并通过Apple Watch和Oura Ring等可穿戴设备自动跟踪你的睡眠，提供个性化的睡眠治疗。如果你没有，我们会借给你一个Apple Watch。

localize.description: Sleepedy通過將你與睡眠教練聯繫起來，並通過Apple Watch和Oura Ring等可穿戴設備自動跟蹤你的睡眠，提供個性化的睡眠治療。如果你沒有，我們會借給你一個Apple Watch。
localize.tagline: 通過私人睡眠教練跟蹤和改善睡眠

nodes.excerpt: Hunter Author Finder is a new way to find targeted email addresses of bloggers and journalists. Enter an article URL and get the contact information of the author in seconds.

localize.description: Hunter Author Finder是一种新的方式来寻找博客和记者的目标电子邮件地址。输入一个文章的URL，并在几秒钟内获得作者的联系信息。

nodes.excerpt: Blockchain and Crypto products are submitted and voted upon by the Block Zen community every day (just like Product Hunt). Block Zen helps you can track the daily innovations taking place in this space.

nodes.excerpt: This API enables you to scrape any data from any website, without worrying about proxies, CAPTCHAs, headless browsers and many other complexities involved in web scraping. We make sure you never get blocked again!
nodes.title: Web Scraper API - Scrape the web at scale without getting blocked
nodes.author: Philip Källberg

localize.description: 这个API可以让您从任何网站上刮取任何数据，而不用担心代理，CAPTCHA，无头浏览器和许多其他复杂的网络刮取。我们确保你永远不会再被封杀!
localize.tagline: 规模化搜刮网页，不被封杀。

localize.description: 這個API可以讓您從任何網站上刮取任何數據，而不用擔心代理，CAPTCHA，無頭瀏覽器和許多其他複雜的網絡刮取。我們確保你永遠不會再被封殺!
localize.tagline: 規模化搜刮網頁，不被封殺。

nodes.excerpt: GRID is a productivity tool that transforms spreadsheets into interactive, visually dynamic web documents. GRID makes sharing and presenting spreadsheet data and models smart, quick, and exceptionally valuable.
nodes.title: GRID - Turn your spreadsheets into smart, interactive web documents
nodes.author: Hjalmar Gislason

localize.description: GRID是一个生产力工具，它可以将电子表格转化为交互式的、视觉上动态的网络文档。GRID使共享和展示电子表格数据和模型变得智能、快速和异常有价值。
localize.tagline: 将您的电子表格变成智能的交互式网络文档

localize.description: GRID是一個生產力工具，它可以將電子表格轉化爲交互式的、視覺上動態的網絡文檔。GRID使共享和展示電子表格數據和模型變得智能、快速和異常有價值。
localize.tagline: 將您的電子表格變成智能的交互式網絡文檔

nodes.excerpt: Snaptrude is a next-gen 3D design tool for the construction industry. It helps Architects design efficient & sustainable buildings 10x faster on the web. It saves weeks’ worth of efforts as compared to legacy tools owing to its automation & data powered core.
nodes.title: Snaptrude - Design efficient buildings in 3D, 10x faster from the web
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Snaptrude是建筑行业的下一代3D设计工具。它可以帮助建筑师在网络上以10倍的速度设计高效和可持续的建筑。由于其自动化和数据驱动的核心，与传统工具相比，它可以节省数周的努力。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式设计高效建筑，从网络上看，速度快10倍

localize.description: Snaptrude是建築行業的下一代3D設計工具。它可以幫助建築師在網絡上以10倍的速度設計高效和可持續的建築。由於其自動化和數據驅動的核心，與傳統工具相比，它可以節省數週的努力。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式設計高效建築，從網絡上看，速度快10倍

nodes.excerpt: Leadsie helps marketing freelancers & agencies get access to their clients’ Facebook assets & Google Analytics without hassle. ✅ Impress your clients with how fast you can start delivering them value. And stop wasting time getting access. 💪

localize.description: Leadsie帮助营销自由职业者和代理公司无忧无虑地访问客户的Facebook资产和谷歌分析。✅ 让您的客户印象深刻，您可以如此快速地开始为他们提供价值。而不再浪费时间去获取。💪
localize.tagline: 2点击进入Facebook和Google Analytics✅。

nodes.excerpt: Sonar.Network provides automatic daily website analysis. Analysis of more than 50 SEO errors, checking all website pages for CSS, JS, HTML validation. Payment for each site separately, the limit of 50,000 pages per site, daily checks, notifications.
nodes.title: Sonar Network - Automatic daily website analysis

localize.description: 声纳网提供每日自动网站分析。分析50多个SEO错误，检查所有网站页面的CSS、JS、HTML验证。每个网站单独付费，每个网站5万个页面的限制，每天检查，通知。
localize.tagline: 网站每日自动分析

nodes.excerpt: Use your web apps as true apps with Firework! 🚀 Turn your everyday websites into desktop apps 🕹 Keep them on hand on the Taskbar or Dock 🏁 The apps launch instantly and are immediately ready to use 🎭 Switch between your web apps using familiar methods
nodes.title: Firework 2 - Easy access to web sites and applications
nodes.author: Alexey Fedorov

localize.description: 将您的网络应用程序作为真正的应用程序使用，Firework! 🚀 将您的日常网站变成桌面应用程序 🕹 将它们放在任务栏或停靠点上 🏁 应用程序立即启动，并立即可以使用 🎭 使用熟悉的方法在您的网络应用程序之间切换。
localize.tagline: 轻松访问网站和应用程序

nodes.excerpt: Steady Newsletters is for independent writers, who are looking for a home for their work and are not averse to making money from it. Send professionally designed newsletters, including videos, podcasts, and tweets. Free to use, we keep 10% commission.
nodes.title: Steady Newsletters - Newsletters with paid memberships for independent writers
nodes.author: Sebastian Esser

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是为独立作家，谁正在寻找一个家为他们的工作，并不反感从它赚钱。发送专业设计的新闻通讯，包括视频、播客和推特。免费使用，我们保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 为独立作家提供付费会员资格的新闻通讯。

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是爲獨立作家，誰正在尋找一個家爲他們的工作，並不反感從它賺錢。發送專業設計的新聞通訊，包括視頻、播客和推特。免費使用，我們保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 爲獨立作家提供付費會員資格的新聞通訊。

nodes.excerpt: Send Letters Online! 💌 1. Write your letter ✍️, enter the receiver's address 📮 & pay $. 2. Letterflix's automated PrintCenter will print 🖨, package 📨, and ship 🚀. 3. Your loved ones will receive it within 7 days 🥳 🤩 or 10-15 days in another country 🌏.
nodes.title: Letterflix - Send letters online 💌
nodes.author: Rajat Dangi

localize.description: 在线发送信件! 💌 1. 写好你的信✍️，输入收信人的地址📮，并支付$。 2. Letterflix的自动打印中心将打印🖨，包装📨，并运送🚀。3. 您的亲人将在7天内收到🥳 🤩，或在其他国家10-15天内收到🌏。
localize.tagline: 在线寄信 💌。

localize.description: 在線發送信件! 💌 1. 寫好你的信✍️，輸入收信人的地址📮，並支付$。 2. Letterflix的自動打印中心將打印🖨，包裝📨，並運送🚀。3. 您的親人將在7天內收到🥳 🤩，或在其他國家10-15天內收到🌏。
localize.tagline: 在線寄信 💌。

nodes.excerpt: Buy less, by knowing more. Discover great quality clothes that don’t sacrifice the environment or the people that made them. Putting sustainable brands front and centre. ✅ Find clothes made by brands that care ✅ Read honest reviews from people, not brands ✅ Make more informed purchases

localize.description: 通过了解更多信息，减少购买量。发现那些不以牺牲环境或制造它们的人为代价的优质服装。把可持续发展的品牌放在首位。✅ 寻找由关心环境的品牌所制造的衣服 ✅ 阅读来自人们而非品牌的诚实评论 ✅ 进行更明智的购买。

nodes.excerpt: I am a forgetful person. Many times after I open my MacBook and scan some news, I totally forget what I initially try to accomplish. I want to build a simple tool to display my current goal on the menu bar
nodes.title: One Goal - Makes your goal more visible by showing it on the menu bar
nodes.author: timqian

localize.description: 我是一个健忘的人。很多时候，当我打开MacBook并扫描一些新闻后，我完全忘记了我最初想达到的目的。我想建立一个简单的工具，在菜单栏上显示我当前的目标。
localize.tagline: 通过在菜单栏上显示目标，使您的目标更加明显。

localize.description: 我是一個健忘的人。很多時候，當我打開MacBook並掃描一些新聞後，我完全忘記了我最初想達到的目的。我想建立一個簡單的工具，在菜單欄上顯示我當前的目標。
localize.tagline: 通過在菜單欄上顯示目標，使您的目標更加明顯。

nodes.excerpt: Social Web Suite is a powerful, easy to use, efficient, and intelligent social media management tool that helps small business owners, bloggers, social media managers, agencies, and enterprises save time, increase productivity, and get better business results.
nodes.title: Social Web Suite - Set it and forget it social media perfected
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Social Web Suite是一款强大、易用、高效、智能的社会化媒体管理工具，可以帮助小企业主、博客、社会化媒体经理、代理公司和企业节省时间，提高工作效率，获得更好的商业成果。
localize.tagline: 设置和忘记它的社交媒体完善

localize.description: Social Web Suite是一款強大、易用、高效、智能的社會化媒體管理工具，可以幫助小企業主、博客、社會化媒體經理、代理公司和企業節省時間，提高工作效率，獲得更好的商業成果。
localize.tagline: 設置和忘記它的社交媒體完善
